channel.title: Abouts on Michael Stenz
channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on Michael Stenz

item.title: Michael Stenz
item.description:
Hi there!

I’m Michael and a computer science student from austria! I love starting projects and one of my biggest weaknesses is to finish one of my sideprojects :)

I graduated at HTL Leonding in the branch IT/Media-technologies, but my heart lies at the IT part.

For all of my personal projects check out my Github and my posts here about my projects.

Linux / FOSS Meetup

I’m one of the three organizers of the Linz Linux / FOSS meetup. With our meetup that occurs every 3-4 months we built an amazing community that I’m really proud of.
